SEARCH
Package ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380

Class DataRetriever

java.lang.Object
ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380.DataRetriever
Direct Known Subclasses:
NewsAPI
public class DataRetriever extends Object
The DataRetriever class is responsible for retrieving data from an external source using an API. It stores the necessary parameters for the API request including the API key, endpoint, geographical coordinates, and date. This class provides methods to set and get these parameters.
Since:
2024-07-20
Version:
1.0
